name: William MILLER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA-CIVIL DIVISION, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Miller v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: William MILLER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA-CIVIL DIVISION, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
96 A.3d 1022
William MILLER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA-CIVIL DIVISION, Respondent.
No. 51 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 24, 2014.
